name: The Exile on the Long Shore
name_original: The Exile on the Long Shore
description:
15.1.3422. We made camp on that precipice, trading one stranger for another. This one, however, seemed far less... hostile.

Special thanks to my Patrons:

Alex Howard Whitaker, Amy Parent, Aodhan Creelman, Bounder Games, BSXDrayden, Ian, Jack Deeth, Jay Tholen, jctwood, Joel Beardshaw, Lexa Francis, Nick Lange, Norgg, Ryan Evans, Sam Macdougal Greer, Sarah Cole
